Body:
Description: we had EPP client  installed on one of our server , Internet stopped working on that server,
After we removed client internet working fine , please provide solution
why EPP randomly stopped internet access , our policies are on report only
Kindly  Resolve it ASAP

The customer have slowness in the UI, the most visible one is on the CAP policies when they try to edit one policy.

We performed an optimisation on the server, checked for duplicates (doesn't have) and decreased the number of records displayed.
